Mitigation.Reject Reasons: 1) Small business set up, Low stock, Low footfalls at time of PD visit 2) Business sale purchase recods are not available,   since most of the business transaction in cash only.3) No business registration proof available to validate business vintage of minimum 3 year as per policy requirement
Mitigation.List of Mitigants: 1) Higher business references checks are done to validate actual business volume2) Business vinatge confirmed by collecting old Bills / Invoices related to same business3) Discussed with Applicant and Identified additional rental income fetching from his another self owned property.
Mitigation.Quantitative measures, Mitigates (e.g. A: Premium ROI to be Charged over and above the Standard ROI Grid
Mitigation.Qualitative / Subjectivity - Elements to: 1. During the PD, Business Related proof / bills of at least 24 months to be readily available with the customer. SRO / KRO to be sensitized about this

Mitigation.Reject Reasons: 1) Small business set up, Low stock, Low footfalls at time of PD visit2) Co-App low Job continuity of 9 month only
Mitigation.List of Mitigants: 1) Business transaction records of total monthly sale and purchase seen, reflect good business margin of 18% 2) Identified Co-App well qualified B. Tech degree holder and starts with good salary, his future job prospects will be good
Mitigation.Quantitative measures, Mitigates (e.g. A: 1) Funded only for Balance Transfer Amt from other institution 2) offered No top up amount
Mitigation.Qualitative / Subjectivity - Elements to: 1. as above2.restricted the loan amountCrux, for a lower loan amount- Credit team was comfortable.There should be simulation work sheet for the SRO / KRO to close the deal on the loan amount

Mitigation.Reject Reasons: 1) Recent employement details provided 2) No previous Job continuity proof available
Mitigation.List of Mitigants: 1) Applicant shared his previous company work experience certificate for 3 year2) employment vintage also verified through Applicant's PF Statement
Mitigation.Quantitative measures, Mitigates (e.g. A: Offered Standard LTV n FOIR as defind in policy
Mitigation.Qualitative / Subjectivity - Elements to: 1. In case of recent employment, previous Business proof can be shared at the time of login itself

Mitigation.Quantitative measures, Mitigates (e.g. A: Offered Standard LTV n FOIR as defind in policy
Mitigation.Qualitative / Subjectivity - Elements to: 1. Risk of customer - native of some location, business and proposed collateral is some other location2. in the above scenario, comfort could be derived if there is local touch point - by taking additional guarantor
